sentences.sContent: He took the car without the owner’s consent .
sentences.sCn: 他没有得到车主的许可就把车开走了。

sentences.sContent: Her parents gave their consent to the marriage.
sentences.sCn: 她父母同意了这桩婚事。

sentences.sContent: A patient can refuse consent for a particular treatment at any time.
sentences.sCn: 任何时候病人都可以拒绝同意某一治疗方法。

sentences.sContent: Most owners are happy to have their names used for publicity if this is done with their prior consent .
sentences.sCn: 大多数所有者都乐意自己的名字用在宣传中，只要事先征得他们的同意就行。

synos.tran: 同意；（意见等的）一致；赞成

phrases.pCn: 知情同意，知会同意；知后同意

words.tran: 交感的；在双方同意下成立的
